thread.title: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez makes peace with water cooler
thread.title_full: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez makes peace with water cooler

author: 8-Foot Cobra Found in Orlando After Over a Month on the Slither
title: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez makes peace with water cooler
text:
Pirates' Sean Rodriguez makes peace with water cooler Associated Press 16 hrs ago PITTSBURGH (AP) It's all good between Pittsburgh Pirates infielder Sean Rodriguez and the water cooler he TKO'd in the dugout during Pittsburgh's wild-card loss to the Chicago Cubs on Wednesday night.
AdChoices Rodriguez was ejected in the seventh inning when the benches cleared and decided to take out his frustrations on an unsuspecting water cooler. Rodriguez worked several combinations on the cooler before it tumbled to the ground.
The one-sided bout drew an avalanche of meme's and GIFs as well as a (at)Piratescooler parody Twitter account that quickly gained over 8,000 followers. Rodriguez took to Twitter to apologize on Thursday ''for allowing my emotions to control my actions in a negative manner.''
Rodriguez added he ''spoke to the cooler, apologized personally, and he's forgiven me as Christ forgives all.''
